data.title: Bruce Springsteen: Huge moments from his incredible career
data.meta_description: Everything you need to know about Bruce Springsteen's incredible career, from his influences, biggest hits and the E Street Band.
data.text:
Known for his huge hits like 'Dancing in the Dark', 'Born to Run' and 'Born in the USA', Bruce Springsteen is widely regarded as one of the greatest songwriters and performers of all time. Despite being in the music industry for more than half a century, he is still going strong - even with a new documentary on the way!

Bruce Springsteen & The E Street Band will be returning to the UK to perform four dates in May and June, however before that, fans can enjoy a greatest hits album from The Boss called 'Best of Bruce Springsteen', which landed on 19th April. Take a trip down memory lane and see some of the biggest moments from his career so far, as well as what's to come.

Take a look at Bruce Springsteen's incredible career:
